pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.3: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.4: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpetī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.8: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ caṇḍakāḷiṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpessati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:1.11: “Yā pana bhikkhunī purisasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ kumārakasaṃsaṭṭhaṃ caṇḍiṃ sokāvāsaṃ sikkhamānaṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.19: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc79:2.1.23: gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
